extendedInfo.description: EditorsÃ­ Choice of authorsÃ­ research by scientists for scientistsThis Elsevier app delivers directly to you a selection of highlighted scientific research articles, handpicked by journal editors.The selected journals, chosen (graphical) abstracts in the EditorsÃ­ Choice app match the scientific scope of the exhibition Elsevier is attending.  The content will be available prior to, and for 3 months past the last day of the event.Download the app to simply navigate through the articles abstracts, read the editorsÃ­ motivations, share content and view the editorsÃ­ profiles. This app has been created to highlight the publisherÃ­s online approach to the scientific research community. As Elsevier publishes more than 95% of its information online, and with the increasing use of smart content and APIs, the move from print publishing to digital dissemination is firmly rooted within the research community. For those using the app please don't hesitate to let us know your thoughts or suggestions by sending your feedback to editorschoice@elsevier.com.Elsevier, journal content, articles, graphical abstracts, science, editors, journals, event, exhibition, editors choice, editors choice app
